alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 3:24AM PDT until March 24 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Ventura County Mountains and Interstate 5 Corridor. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Delays and road closures are possible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on Interstate 5 over the Grapevine could be affected this morning. Expect possible travel delays.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains
